[8][9] samadina pasal welawedi riksdag pitatha wadiwi sitimin " skulstreyik far klimotet " ("deshagunaya wenuwen pasal wada warim") yana pataya ragath puwaruwa dakwamin tunbari wirodhathawaya pala kalaya.[10]ayage illim athara, swidana rajaya wisin paris sammuthiya prakara wimodanayan adu kala yuthu bawada wiya.
